name: Kikuni Masahiko no Jantoushi Doraou 2
overview: A mahjong game with a parody supernatural superhero theme. Like its predecessor, it uses mahjong as a sort of component for its "battle" system. Kikuni Masahiko no Jantoushi Dora Ou 2 is a bit more "free", allowing the player to explore the world map. It also allows for four-person games, removing the two-person limitation of its forebear.
